casebody.data:
STATE of Connecticut
v.
Robert John PURCELL Supreme Court of Connecticut. Decided October 11, 2017

Richard Emanuel, in support of the petition.

Timothy J. Sugrue, assistant state's attorney, in opposition.

The defendant's petition for certification to appeal from the Appellate Court, 174 Conn.App. 401, 166 A.3d 883 (2017), is granted, limited to the following question:

"Given his statements during custodial interrogation, was the defendant's constitutional right to counsel denied by the trial court when it denied his motion to suppress?"
